name: BNNSLayerParametersTensorContraction
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a tensor-contraction layer.

items.name: init(operation: UnsafePointer<CChar>, alpha: Float, beta: Float, iA_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, iB_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor)
items.desc: Returns a new tensor-contraction parameters structure.

items.name: var operation: UnsafePointer<CChar>
items.desc: The string that describes the operation.

items.name: var alpha: Float
items.desc: Scaling that the operation applies to the result.

items.name: var beta: Float
items.desc: A value, that must be either 0.0 or 1.0, you use to scale the existing output before the operation adds it to the result.

items.name: var iA_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of input matrix A.

items.name: var iB_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of input matrix B.
